entries.title: Apple patent points to MacBook keys that change dynamically
entries.description: A recent Apple patent application suggests that keyboards on future MacBooks could have a flexible design.

entries.title: Weird Windows 11 bug that messed up Task Manager gets a fix
entries.description: Everybody likes a splash of color in their operating system, but not when it makes the interface unreadable.

entries.title: We found this air fryer gingerbread cookies recipe on Instagram - it made the crunch
entries.description: Want to make gingerbread cookies in the air fryer? Here's how...

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 dummy units show off the look of the flagship phones
entries.description: Dummy units of the Galaxy S23 and the Galaxy 23 Plus have leaked out online ahead of their launch.

entries.title: AWS CISO: Why our new Security Lake is a game-changer for the industry
entries.description: Security needs to be the path of least resistance, AWS CISO CJ Moses tells us.

entries.title: Windows 11 gaming bug fix is now rolling out to everyone
entries.description: That nasty bug which was causing stuttering frame rates has finally been fully resolved.

entries.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Ti: everything we know about the rumored graphics card
entries.description: The Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti has risen from the ashes of the cancelled RTX 4080 12GB.
